<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Environment

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''setShadowDistance''' value

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>'''setShadowDistance''' 1000</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getShadowDistance]], [[isPipEnabled]]
</value></part></template>
